title: Accessibility
description: Adjust the app to your needs with these accessibility settings

highContrast.title: High Contrast Mode
highContrast.description: Increases the contrast of text and UI elements for better visibility

largeText.title: Large Text
largeText.description: Makes text bigger throughout the application

reduceMotion.title: Reduce Motion
reduceMotion.description: Reduces or eliminates animations and transitions

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Change the language of the application

textSize.title: Text Size
textSize.description: Adjust the size of text throughout the app

hapticFeedback.title: Haptic Feedback
hapticFeedback.description: Enable or disable vibration feedback on actions
